body.name: LIKIMIO Dresser 8 Drawer, Modern Wood Bedroom Dresser with with Charging Station and Storage Bag, Storage Chest of Drawers for Living Room Hallway Entryway, White
features: Plenty of storage space: Featuring 8 drawers, this storage unit provides ample space for clothes and other items. The drawers help keep your items organized and separate, making everything neat and easily accessible.

Durability: Constructed from high-quality MDF board, this piece of furniture is both sturdy and long-lasting. It’s easy to clean and maintain and includes anti-tip hardware for added stability and safety

Dresser with Charging Station: It comes with a built-in charging station that includes two standard plugs and two USB ports. This feature makes it very convenient for you to charge your electronic devices and use them within easy reach.

Elegant and Classic: Featuring beveled edges, a curved kickboard, and straight metal handles, this dresser has an elegant and classic design that complements a variety of different home decor styles. It’s sure to be the main focus of any room.

Multi-functional: Designed with storage and style in mind, this piece of furniture is multi-functional and great for bedrooms and living rooms. The thick and spacious top can be used to display, and It can also be used as a TV stand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LIKIMIO Dresser: The ultimate storage solution for your style. Whether you’re looking for a dresser for your bedroom, living room, or any other space, this wood dresser with 8 drawers is the perfect choice. Made from high-quality MDS board, this dresser is both durable and stylish. The classic design features clean lines and a warm finish that will complement any decor.

A simple, functional chest of drawers With 8 drawers, this dresser is perfect for those who need plenty of storage space. The drawers are spacious and easy to open, making it easy to find what you need when you need it.

Details you will like Convenience charging station It’s a versatile piece of furniture that can help you stay organized and keep your electronics charged and ready to use. storage bag Comes with a storage bag, adding extra storage to make life more convenient.

versatile A dresser with a spacious tabletop can be used multifunctionally. Not only can it hold your clothes and other items, but it can also be used as a TV stand while displaying items. The ample tabletop provides plenty of room for your TV, while the drawers can be used to store your clothes and bedroom essentials.

Specifications: Color: white Material: MDF board Overall Dimension: 15.8"D x 59.1"W x 31.5"H Spacious Drawer Dimensions: 12.2"D x 26.8"W x 8.3"H Tiny Drawers Dimensions: 12.2"D x 13.8"W x 8.3"H Number of drawers 8 Tipover Restraint Device Included load-bearing 220lbs drawer load-bearing 50lbs Product Care Wipe Clean with Damp Cloth easy to assmeble yes Package Contents: dresser ,charging station storage bag, parts and Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it. It was a pain in the neck to build tho. I couldn’t do it by myself and I love to be independent. It has great drawer space. It is big tho so if you’re looking for something small make sure you measure. Extremely sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect size for my apartment bedroom. Just make sure that you put all the drawers in their proper place. It’s a cute and subtle dresser. The design is perfect for me! It prevents my cats from getting in my dresser! It’s sturdy, it wasn’t too expensive, and we love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing was a pain in the neck to put together. That being said, the instructions were clear, and everything was packaged in a way that prevented damage, despite the box looking like fedex ran it over with a truck. It's a nice, solid, dresser at a very good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy the wood broke when I took it out of the box the wood bends the screws are mislabeled it took three days to put together and still never completely put together do not buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have someone with u who knows what they’re doing
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my one year old. Very study. And I love that it has the plugs on top

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Anything this bog and complex, assembly is what it is. Took probably 2 hours to get everything assembled, then figure out which drawer goes into which hole. I can hear your condescending remark now, "the big ones go in the big holes, the small ones in the small holes." Yeah, except they don't just fit into any of the holes. We literally had to try each drawer in their corresponding size hole to figure out which one it "fit" in and closed all the way. Somehow the front of the drawer on some were slightly over compared to the others of the same size. So they all fit in only one way. That might be what some few others mentioned about not being able to close drawers all the way. Another thing about the drawers, and this is partially my fault for not understanding the measurements better, they are SUPER shallow. I can only fit about 4 shirts stacked into the drawers. The front of the drawer makes it look plenty big for your clothes, but the drawer itself is only a small fraction of the size of the front cover.The quality feels OK. Like if we don't abuse it, it'll prob last many years, but I kinda don't want it to. It's way too big and complicated so I really don't want to take it back apart to return. Technically it'll work fine for us. I recently got rid of a ton of clothes and bought new, so I don't have an overabundance of clothes that don't all fit in it. The jacks on the top are a nice feature, although I wouldn't probably use it if not for the "riser" stand I have that covers the outlets so the cables aren't just hanging out noticeable. I have my PS4 under it and plugged into the outlet and it looks nice. And it does look nice. The whole design is really nice to look at. The added "box thing" on the side is a unique concept and very useful.Overall it's OK. I'm just disappointed at the lack of storage space for such a big dresser. So much wasted space in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Spent 300 and probably 6 hours building this for one drawer to be slanted and slightly pushes out with the others not really straight. Definitely skinny and does not fit lots of clothes. NOT good for a dresser and not worth the cheat particle board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's not as hard to put together as you think...
reviews.reviewText: one review that almost made me NOT purchase was how everyone was saying the instructions are hard.... and it's really not. the instructions are the exact same as what a lego set of directions would be. goes Iverson your parts that you have and it's wordless and just pictures from there. if you've built lego sets before your golden. thankfully I have no life and enjoy lego sets and building tedious things. the craftsmanship of the dresser was excellent I didn't have any broken peices thankfully!!! my mail carriers have always been very gentle and courteous so not sure if that has anything to do with anything. all in all it did take about 4 hours to complete, just me and my boyfriend with some pauses to eat dinner while watching TV as we completed it too, but it was worth it. very beautiful dresser and even though it has more drawer space than our last one it's a bit skinnier which brings out more of our bedroom which we love. this dresser is definitely one to purchase if you're in the market for one!!
